chapters.title: Chapter 45:  Tendrils of Mist
chapters.info: Shaisam, p. 864—What Mashadar, and Fain, have become. He is present at Thakan'dar, feasting, growing stronger. Currently frail, Shaisam seeks a place in which the barriers betwene realities are thin enough that it may make manifest there. Until then, it clings to its human body. See also Fain, Padan; Mashadar; Mordeth.
